import { makeStyles, Paper } from '@material-ui/core'; import React from 'react'; import { IAM_APP, USERS_LIST_COUNT } from '../../../utils/constants'; import { numDiscriminant } from '../../../utils/discriminant'; import { useFetchApi } from '../../../utils/hooks'; import { UrlQuery } from '../../../utils/utils'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { display: 'flex', // flexWrap: 'wrap', flexDirection: 'row', alignContent: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-around', alignItems: 'center', maxWidth: '1600px', '& > *': { maxWidth: '306px', height: '160px', margin: '20px 0 20px 0', // paddingLeft: "20px", backgroundColor: '#293034', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', borderRadius: "10px", flexWrap: 'wrap', alignContent: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', }, '& > div:nth-child(2n)': { margin: "0 20px" } }, })); const CardSection = () => { const classes = useStyles(); const [params, setParams] = React.useState({ size: 10, page: 1 }) const [{ data, isLoading, hasError }, doFetch] = useFetchApi(undefined, []) React.useEffect(() => { doFetch("GET", IAM_APP, UrlQuery(USERS_LIST_COUNT, params)) }, [params]) console.log("users",data) return (
